idea-plugin.name: Serial Monitor
idea-plugin.description:
A powerful Serial Port Monitor with real-time data visualization for JetBrains IDEs.

Perfect for Arduino, ESP32, embedded systems, and IoT development. Monitor serial communication and visualize data in real-time with beautiful charts.

Monitor Tab Features:

  • Real-time Serial Communication - Monitor data from serial ports instantly
  • Auto Port Detection - Automatically detect available serial ports
  • Flexible Baud Rates - Support for 9600 to 921600 baud
  • Bi-directional Communication - Send and receive data
  • Advanced Filtering - Normal text search and regular expression filtering
  • Auto-scroll and Clear - Convenient log management
  • Copy to Clipboard - Easy log export

Plotter Tab Features:

  • Real-time Data Visualization - Plot numerical data as it arrives
  • Multiple Data Series - Display multiple channels simultaneously
  • Smooth Curves - Optional smooth line rendering with spline interpolation
  • Scrolling Window - ECG-style auto-scrolling display
  • Interactive Controls - Zoom, pan, and manual scrolling
  • Configurable Format - Custom data separators and window size
  • Legend Management - Toggle visibility of individual series

Use Cases:

  • Arduino and ESP32 development
  • Embedded systems debugging
  • IoT device communication
  • Sensor data monitoring and visualization
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Version 1.1.0 - Enhanced Monitoring (2026-02-25)

  • Added Pause/Resume button to pause data reception and output
  • Added timestamp display option in Monitor tab (HH:mm:ss.SSS format)
  • Timestamps are only shown in UI, not affecting data parsing for Plotter
  • Improved UI controls and data management

Version 1.0.1 - Compatibility Fix (2026-02-16)

  • Fixed IDE compatibility configuration to support CLion 261 and latest versions
  • Updated until-build version to 261.*

Version 1.0.0 - Initial Release (2026-02-16)

Monitor Tab

  • Real-time serial port monitoring with multiple baud rates
  • Automatic port detection and refresh
  • Send data to serial port
  • Advanced log filtering (normal text and regex)
  • Auto-scroll, clear, and copy functions

Plotter Tab

  • Real-time data visualization with XChart
  • Multiple data series support
  • Smooth curve rendering with Catmull-Rom spline
  • Scrolling window with configurable size
  • Interactive zoom and pan controls
  • Intelligent auto-scroll behavior
  • Configurable data format and display options
  • Legend panel with series visibility toggle

Technical

  • Built with Kotlin 1.9.21
  • jSerialComm 2.8+ for cross-platform serial communication
  • XChart 3.8.7 for high-performance charting
  • Compatible with JetBrains IDEs 2024.1+
